Class RibbonLoadBalancer

  • java.lang.Object

    public class RibbonLoadBalancer
extends Object
implements LoadBalancer, com.netflix.loadbalancer.ILoadBalancer

        Creates the ILoadBalancer to use. Defaults to ZoneAwareLoadBalancer. Subclasses can override to provide custom behaviour
        Parameters:
        clientConfig - The client config
        rule - The IRule
        ping - THe IPing
        serverListFilter - The ServerListFilter
        serverList - The ServerList
        Returns:
        The ILoadBalancer instance. Never null
